## Learning Objectives

By the end of this class, you will be able to:

- choose appropriate visualization for discrete data. 
- choose appropriate visualization for numerical data. 
- choose appropriate visualization for multivariate data. 
- calculate and use descriptive statistics such as mean, median, mode, standard deviation, variance, interquartile range, count, and proportion.
- describe shape and spread of distributions.
